General.Name: Mode Tour Real Estate Investment Trust Inc
General.Description: MODE Tour Real Estate Investment Incorporated acquires, enhances, manages, develops, disposes, and rents real estate properties primarily in South Korea. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. MODE Tour Real Estate Investment Incorporated is a former subsidiary of MODETOUR Network Inc.
General.Address: Namsan Square Building, Seoul, South Korea
